Note: The money supply already includes deposits of the Housing Provident Fund Center and deposits from non-deposit financial institutions at deposit-type financial institutions. From June 2001, client margin deposits of securities companies have been included in the money supply (M2), which are contained within other deposits.
Data Source: National Bureau of Statistics
